titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: We were photographed for our passports in the Strand. Then I walked to Westminster, & visited both the Abbey & St Margaret's. I went to Whippell's, & tried on the new purple dress suit: & then returned to the Hotel, where Ella was having a Swedish lesson. Then we lunched, paid our reckoning (a monstrous sum!) and drove to Paddington. We arrived in Hereford shortly before 8 p.m., & were met by Bateman.
